title: Verify Property Tax Information
description: When creating a new listing, an agent needs to verify the official property tax amount and check for any special assessments.

tasks.description: Identify the property's Parcel ID Number (APN).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly finds the property's APN.

tasks.description: Access the county tax assessor's public records database using the APN.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully navigates to the property's tax record page.

tasks.description: Extract the most recent annual tax amount and note any Mello-Roos or other special assessments to include in the listing disclosures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records all relevant tax information.
